metadata.prompt: An engaging title card: "Your Hands: First Line of Defense!" with a dynamic image of clean, gloved hands.
A stylist vigorously washing their hands at a modern salon sink, with lots of soap bubbles. The water is running. The image is clean and active.

A clear graphic comparing soap and water vs. hand sanitizer. On one side: a sink icon with "SOAP & WATER = Primary." On the other: a hand sanitizer bottle icon with "HAND SANITIZER = Secondary / Supplement."
A shot of a stylist's hands covered in hair color or product. They are turning towards a sink with a determined expression. A red 'X' hovers over a hand sanitizer bottle.
A split-screen. On the left: Hands covered in visible dirt, with a red 'X' over a hand sanitizer bottle. On the right: Clean hands, with a green checkmark over a hand sanitizer bottle.
A final shot of a stylist confidently greeting a client with clean, professional hands, symbolizing trust and safety.
